pr_title: Parse XML errors like in S3

timeline.bodyText: We shouldn't add log4j.properties in the main resources
timeline.author: dagnir

replies.bodyText: I thought I added it in the test directory, will move it.
replies.author: cenedhryn

timeline.bodyText:
Thinking about this some more, I'm not sure that this is the right behavior; it's possible that the user could still want this behavior even with an endpoint override.
Can we leave this change out of the client for now? For testing, we can we can just add a new client interceptor that changes the request URL to the WireMock host before it's sent.
timeline.author: dagnir

replies.bodyText: Yes, that sounds like a less intrusive change.
replies.author: cenedhryn

timeline.message: Changes document error root definition for XML based errors to same as AWS S1, so that errors are fully parsed. This change also adds honoring endpoint overrides for the S3 Control client.

timeline.bodyText: New changes look good, but looks like this still needs to be reverted along with the accompanying test.
timeline.author: dagnir
